doc:
Biff Elliot https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biff_Elliot 0 Biff Elliot (born Leon Shalek, July 26, 1923 – August 15, 2012) was an American actor. He is perhaps best known for his role as popular detective Mike Hammer in the 1953 version of I, the Jury, and for his guest appearance in the Star Trek episode "The Devil in the Dark". Biff_Elliot ( born Leon_Shalek , July_26_,_1923 – August_15_,_2012 ) was an_American_actor . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_role as popular_detective_Mike_Hammer in the_1953_version of I , the_Jury , and for his_guest_appearance in the_Star_Trek_episode " The_Devil in the_Dark_" .
